text: Alexandru Turei (born August 7, 1952 in Cluj-Napoca) is a former light flyweight Romanian boxer who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was defeated by Enrique Rodríguez in the first round of Olympic tournament. ==References== Sports Reference Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic boxers of Romania Category:Boxers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Romanian male boxers Category:Light-flyweight boxers
title: Alexandru Turei
